# init(content:)

**Initializer**

Creates a renderer object with a source content view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(content view: Content)
```

## Parameters

- **view**: A [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View] to render.
